price: ជានៀកម៉ាត់ពីយើង។ ដូច្នោះដែរ យើងតបស្នងចំពោះ អ្នកណាដែលបានដឹងគុណ។
arabic: نِّعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَن شَكَرَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: niʿ'matan min ʿindinā kadhālika najzī man shakara
